articles.title: Trudeau calls for renegotiated border treaty to halt Roxham Road migrants — U.S. envoy pushes back - CBC News
articles.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says the federal government is working on closing the irregular border crossing at Roxham Road by renegotiating the Safe Third Country Agreement with the United States — but the American ambassador to Canada says changing the dea…
